speakers.name: Anita Jaszewska
speakers.description: Anita is a self-learner who entered the IT world through Rails Girls workshops back in 2013. Her business background and a strong interest in people made her naturally drawn to product-related teams and solving user problems using code. She worked in various international companies of different sizes and collected experience as a developer. In the meantime, she started a master's degree in psychology. Initially a hobby, with time, psychology turned into a valuable experience that helped her transition to a managerial path. In her free time, Anita enjoys nature and modern art.
